dishes.name: Fried Tofu
dishes.description: This crispy panko fried tofu served with sweet Sukiyaki sauce is soft on the inside and crispy on the outside, this dish is simply irresistible!

dishes.name: Risotto
dishes.description: The best vegan mushroom risotto you'll ever try! Creamy, velvety, and bursting with savory goodness, it's just like classic risotto but dairy-free and vegan. Includes tips to help you nail the perfect vegan risotto every time.

dishes.name: Pumpking soup
dishes.description: It's creamy, and layered with winter squash, warm and spicy aromatics, and bold spices and herbs. Quite possibly the most flavorful soup you'll ever try!

dishes.name: Fried Tofu
dishes.description: A delightfully unexpected salad quick marinated in maple syrup and citrus, and married with strawberries, peaches and fresh herbs, making this a lovely sweet-tart combo.

drinks.name: Mint-Cucumber Lemonade
drinks.description: Minty Cucumber Lemonade made with only a handful of ingredients - cool, refreshing and delicious!

drinks.name: Fruit Infused Water
drinks.description: Stay hydrated with these easy infused water recipes. If you find plain ol' H2O to be boring, consider making a pitcher of infused water that scores a hint of flavor from fresh fruit, vegetables, and herbs.

drinks.name: Ginger Beer Mojito
drinks.description: I'ts seriously the best mixer!! It's already sweetened, it has the nice spicy kick of the ginger, and it is nice and fizzy and perfect for cool summer drinks like mojitos!

drinks.name: Summer Breeze Cocktail
drinks.description: This cocktail features tequila, Citron and triple sec along with orange juice...and a splash of grenadine to sweeten it up. Sort of a fruitier spin on a Tequila Sunrise cocktail. Try this special, you won't regret it

desserts.name: Brownie with ice cream
desserts.description: Warm and fudgy with premium vanilla ice-cream melting on top, this nutty brownie is chocolate heaven.

desserts.name: Caramel Cheescake
desserts.description: This vegan cheesecake is the best ever! It's rich and creamy and topped with a salted caramel fudge sauce. So much like the 'real thing' you will hardly believe it.

desserts.name: Chocolate Volcano
desserts.description: This is a delicious vegan-friendly version of the classic chocolate lava cake. You'll make a super simple nondairy chocolate ganache, freeze it in balls, and bake it into the center of a decadent chocolate cake.

desserts.name: Coconut Cheescake
desserts.description: Meet the vegan cheesecake of your dreams. Seriously, I was blown away by how delicious this turned out! No one would guess this cheesecake is vegan. It's smooth, rich and creamy but also light in texture.
